meanings.definition: The act of turning up or raising something, such as the volume on a device.
meanings.sent1: She did the turnups on the radio to hear the music better.
meanings.sent2: I always do the turnups on my phone when I want to listen to a podcast.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally did the turnups on the TV and the sound was too loud.
meanings.sent4: The turnups on the speaker made the music fill the room.
meanings.sent5: The turnups on the stove made the soup boil faster.

meanings.definition: A type of vegetable, also known as a turnip.
meanings.sent1: She used turnups in the stew for added flavor.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested fresh turnups from the field.
meanings.sent3: The turnups in the salad gave it a crunchy texture.
meanings.sent4: The turnups in the market were big and round.
meanings.sent5: The turnups in the garden were ready to be picked.

meanings.definition: A style of pants that are folded or rolled up at the bottom.
meanings.sent1: He wore trendy turnups with his sneakers.
meanings.sent2: She bought jeans with turnups for a casual look.
meanings.sent3: The turnups on his pants showed off his cool socks.
meanings.sent4: Her turnups added a unique touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The turnups on his trousers were neatly pressed.
